articles.title: Coronavirus: China set to open speed-built hospital
articles.description: The 1,000-bed Huoshenshan facility was constructed in just eight days in the virus epicentre Wuhan.
articles.content:
Media captionAerial time-lapse shows Wuhan hospital construction
China is set to open a new hospital in the city at the epicentre of the coronavirus outbreak, as the numbers of people infected continue to grow.
Wuhan's 1,000-bed Huoshenshan Hospital, built … [+4864 chars]

articles.content: First death from coronavirus outside ChinaA 44-year-old Chinese man has died after travelling to the Philippines from the city of Wuhan.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: First death from coronavirus outside China
articles.description: The Philippines says a man has died of the coronavirus, the first confirmed fatality outside China
articles.content:
A man has died of the coronavirus in the Philippines in the virus's first confirmed fatality outside China.
The patient was a 44-year-old Chinese man from Wuhan, in Hubei province, where the virus was first detected.
He appeared to have been infected before… [+493 chars]
